title: Apple, beetroot and avocado salad
ingredients: ['3 medium beetroots', '175ml (6 fl oz) pressed apple juice', '125ml (4 fl oz) cider vinegar', '125ml (4 fl oz) vegetable oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1/4 teaspoon celery seed or celery salt', '1 (200g) bag salad leaves', '1 red onion, sliced into thin rings', '1 apple - peeled, cored and thinly sliced', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and sliced', '50g (2 oz) toasted chopped walnuts']
